website_summaries.verdict: This unique chaise lounge is engineered for transport and customization.
pros: Comes with wheels for convenient backyard maneuvering as well as a canopy that can be adjusted depending on your desire for sun
Configured as a modified hammock and chaise that you may be inclined to sleep on overnight
Great for families who constantly seek shade
cons: We would love a protective cover

customer_reviews.title: Happy Bookworm!
customer_reviews.text: We don't have actual trees in our neighborhood and I was DESPERATE for a hammock. I also needed something to accommodate both of my children because...I can never relax somewhere without the two of them. This hammock is PERFECT. I don't have hulk strength so I had to wait for my husbands help to finish set up but that just goes to show how strong and sturdy it is. The built in pillows are so comfortable and my favorite part is the tilting canopy. If the sun is in my eyes I can pull the canopy down and get the perfect amount of shade. This is probably my favorite purchase of the year so far. Bring on the book binging!
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: BUT once together it's probably one of the best things I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Ok, putting it together i cursed myself for buying it. BUT once together it's probably one of the best things I've ever bought. It really is huge which is good cause my giant dogs think they need to lay on it too, but we all fit and its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible addition to our backyard oasis. I am so happy with this purchase. I was concerned for a while as the product did not have a ship date for about 3 weeks. Once it came in, it was evident that it was incredibly sturdy. I messed up putting it together but figured it out. It was mildly difficult to assemble but once together it is incredibly sturdy! My family loves it. Especially my dog;)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany K. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: No complaint. Holds 2 adults and 2 children. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Qualitytextbooks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you and a friend can manage to muscle this thing together, you won't be disappointed. My hope is that it holds up over time and doesn't start to sag. You can comfortably lie on your stomach or any position you'd like. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Material is fraying after 1season and was garaged for winter !!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. A little low to the ground. Disappointed in the material. It’s fraying at the bottom and it’s garage kept. The material was really tight and hard to put on but it stretched out after use. Nothing I can do about it fraying so there are definitely pros and cons
customer_reviews.author: PUMAGAL

customer_reviews.title: My new place of peace
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! Had a little trouble with shipping but it all worked out.. it was easy to put together I had help so it took us about 45mins.. I sit out in it everyday and I also put a netting up to keep the bugs away!
customer_reviews.author: Alaura Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Furniture for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Heavy duty and sturdy mesh material. I would recommend to anyone that like to sun bathe or relax outdoors. Very easy to clean if it gets dirty. Two downfalls. While disassembling for winter storage rusty water leaked out staining the shading top. Also the screws aren’t made of the highest quality so after a few times of disassembling and reassembly they may wear out easily. Overall, great product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RLWcleveland

customer_reviews.title: Canopy top arm snaps in half slightest pressure
customer_reviews.text: First wind storm the arm that connects the top where the screw goes it is so thin and weak. Snapped in half. Why would you not put a break on the wheels. It rolls all over. Very aggravating
customer_reviews.author: tamara tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together but can be done solo
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours trying to get the frame together I decided to read they other reviews because I couldn’t figure out why I couldn’t get it. Thank you to the commenter that said to get that last corner of the frame in pull the fabric to the opposite side as far as you can. After doing so I was able to get this bad boy assembled by myself. It’s definitely comfortable and sturdy I can’t wait to spend my summer on it!
customer_reviews.author: Alison West

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have ever made! We threw a big comforter over for coziness and this is basically a king size bed for the yard! I would recommend to anyone and I would even buy another for friends to use. Yes do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Monaghan

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing...my nap spot by the pool
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! My canopy on my hammock got a RIP in it during a storm, I emailed the company to see if I could buy a replacement. They are sending me one no charge!! It was covered under warranty. GREAT customer service from ABBA!! Love the hammock but my canopy part ripped during a storm can I order just the fabric part of the canopy?
customer_reviews.author: Paul Southard

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge! Very sturdy I def like it and feel comfortable laying on it however it took very long to assemble bc the instructions have no writing it’s only pictures (also was confusing bc in the photos there was a typo said there were 4 bolts of 2 different lengths so 8 in total but there was only one set of four but makes u paranoid if you are missing bolts or if it’s a typo) I decided to keep it indoors bc I saw reviews where it discolours when it’s out in sun.
customer_reviews.author: Repunzel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it...close to impossible to put together
customer_reviews.text: It has been sitting mostly put together for a month. We have tried and TRIED to strong arm it to put it together. The material will not let you hook the last section into place. We’ve tried all of our strength of three people pulling it together and we cannot get the last bar into place. It is currently an expensive hunk of unusable junk that is too big and heavy to return. You have to destroy the box to take it out. So, you are just stuck with it. Thank
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY TO ASSEMBLE
customer_reviews.text: 5 hours into trying to put this thing together and I’m at a loss. It seems like the parts they sent aren’t straight or the right length at all. I’ve had 4 different people try and help put this hell hammock together and it’s just a nightmare. Idk if everyone else is just Superman but I’m literally on the verge of divorcing myself over buying this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Normally, we have have no problem putting things together when we buy furniture (even if it takes us 3 hours). But this product literally can't be put together. I don't know if the one we got is defective or what. But the part where you attach the hammock part to the bottom bar literally was impossible. We even called our neighbors up to help and even with more strength, we could not get the bottom bar (where your feet go) that is holding the hammock to latch into side bars. I'm very disappointed. Such a waste of $190 and time. So if you take any advice in your lifetime, it should be to not waste $190 on this!
customer_reviews.author: Carson B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Mother’s Day for my mom who loves to sunbathe and she loves it. It definitely takes 2 or more people to build and even then it is stubborn, but once put together it is very sturdy. Put more than the recommended weight on it and it held up!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Super muscle needed, not necessary brain
customer_reviews.text: I am prepared mentally after reading reviews of others before buying this item,. What I would suggest to you if you are the next buyer that when comes to the part to stretch the fabric(hemlock) to its frame, you not only need great great great strength, you need to find tools such like lever to assist your pulling. The design is definitely user- unfriendly.
customer_reviews.author: Trixximum

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this thing is a pain to put together and definitely takes 2 people to do. With that said it is great overall. We have had it about a month and so far so good. I like to color and we use other pillows on it as the ones provided are pretty flat. The shade detached and we take it off when not in use and got a cover for the top to keep it nice. I like it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love this bed. It's sturdy, comfortable and very inexpensive. I gave it a 4 star because it didn't come with instructions. Using common sense we were able to put it together but it would have been nice to be able to look at something! Also, pump some iron while your waiting on the bed to arrive. The last corner you need super human strength.
customer_reviews.author: johnston

customer_reviews.title: The bed is nice, the canopy not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Good value if you are only getting the bed itself, which is pretty much what we got when the top blew off during the first few months from a storm. Bent the supporting poles, so we just tossed it and use it as a bed to lay on by the pool. Assembly was a pain in the butt as well, but once you get it together, the bed is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: fun fact while assembling.. scrunch fabric down the top and bottom rods in order to get the last corner put in & double check that the side legs are on the correct side... screw holes towards the inside so the brace pieces can screw into them from underneath. LOVE this for by the pool! fits 2 adults with plenty of room for a kid or 2 to hop on!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Durga

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. It’s huge! If there is a big storm headed my way I do detach the canopy and lay it flat onto the lounge. It’s heavy and sturdy but a GIANT pain the the butt to put together. Pack your patience and read every step thoroughly when you were putting this thing together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers putting the last corner together was hard. You need brute force for sure but once that was done my son and I finished it without trouble.. and then we laid down on it and felt we were in heaven! My husband also laid down on it and we felt like we were on vacation!y nephew wanted to sleep on it all night! I’ve lounged on it every day since we put it together! Buy it you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Elvie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great item once put together but certain parts are very hard to assemble on your own due to tension from the hammock. Also had to use a pair of pliers to even tighten the screws. Some of the stickers labeled with the assembly part also had fallen off, actually only about 20% was labeled when we took it out of the package. Package was also very heavy and awkward to lift. Love it now that it’s done but not sure it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Februaury. By September it was completely discolored from the elements, the top covering had broken off and the mesh started to dry rot. It wasnt very comfortable to begin with, but it looked cool. We put a FREE sign on it for a garage sale, but got no takers. I would not recommend this for anyone that had a lot of direct sun or high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a great, sturdy product but the frame was too big for the sling, the fabric would not stretch at all, and the efforts of three strong men could not get this contraption together. Don't waste your time and effort like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J Tapper

customer_reviews.title: Bye, Bye Hammocks
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, roomy and fab to nap on. We added mosquito netting and now regularly 'camp out' on our deck. Room for us and our two Corgis. Love the tilting canopy for setting sun protection. Hard to believe this level of quality with its more than fair low price! A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Missing items and lack of support
customer_reviews.text: Received sealed with tape but not new (It was supposed to be new) box. I can not complete the assemble because I received 3 parts with the letter I and 1 H, instead of 2 H and 2 I.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Fong

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a wedding gift for friends. They paid someone to put it together. They love it. Look great next to their pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It can be put together by 1 person with lots of patience. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: michelle l merrell

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I had it for couple days. Its very nice to lounge outdoor in sun, My 4 and 6 year old love to cuddle with me outdoor on deck. The size is amazingly satisfying for family. The shade is just about right size to block my face from sun. I would probably recommend buying something to cover when not in use just incase if color fades or the metal rusting. Never know.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: A bolt was lost in shipping but not a big deal. Very easy to assemble. From opening the box to taking a nap on it was about 30 minutes. I know in the reviews people had all kinds of trouble assembling it but it's a piece of cake if you have any common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We've got this on our back patio and enjoy laying out to read in the shade. Husband put it together in about a half hour. All pieces were accounted for and a few spares. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: AZkp

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. It's become the staple of our backyard. We fall asleep in it, read in it, lounge in the sun... it's comfortable and perfect for our family. We've added some pillows to make it extra comfy and everyone absolutely LOVES it, especially the little ones! Assembly was a little tricky but plan it out before diving in and be strategic so you can get the pieces together with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor S

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool chair! Everyone in the family loves it! Sometimes we fall asleep on the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright! Be careful what you pay for it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale... so for the price I paid ($165) I am super STOKED!!! I recently went to buy one for my neighbors because they were a little jellies... and it went up to like $350... definitely NOT worth that! It’s a little wonky. Shwoops in the middle for sure. All in all, I’m happy with it. If I paid more, this review would be different.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie L. M. Bridges

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for myself and my husband, we're both on the tall size and combined around 370 lbs. We have a small dog (about 25 lbs) and he hops on it with us too. Relatively easy to assemble. Very comfy to use. Great to lounge on while reading or just hanging out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won’t have to work arms the day you build it
customer_reviews.text: This thing was so hard to put together, I Reevaluate All my life’s decisions that brought me to that point. The directions make it seem so easy and let me tell you it’s not. I had to summon all the strength within my soul to put this stupid chair together.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Does not go together. canvas is too short
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Canvas is too short for frame to assemble. My son in law, who lifts 400 pounds in a deadlift, could not stretch the canvas to fit the frame with my husband assisting. he is stronger than hercules! So I'm gonna say with confidence that this made in china piece is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K.

customer_reviews.title: 50 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful!! I can lay out in the afternoon and the canopy covers my upper body so just my legs can get some color. It's wide so to flip over I just roll, no more fighting the towel. My 13 year old put it together in about an hour. Moves easily for mowing. My dog loves it too, although she thinks it's a trampoline
customer_reviews.author: KaRae

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together, but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: When I say hard to put together I mean darn near impossible. I almost threw the parts across the yard several times before I got it together. I'm glad I did not because it's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Hobgoblin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My husband and I, and our three boys can all lay on this. It's very comfortable, and the fabric keeps you cool with the holes in it. The air is able to circulate your body so we're all cooler than when we'd lay on the ground. There's only one time of day that the shade doesn't block the sun for us, but it's easy to maneuver, so we just turn it. It took my husband and I about 30 minutes to put it together. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Product good. Shipping sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is pretty good although the Box team severely damaged and a couple of the parts were scuffed and scraped. So I wasn't really happy with that considering I paid over 200 for this.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie kite

customer_reviews.title: great chair and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: great chair and very comfortable! I recommend taking the canopy off if there's a storm or high winds. mine snapped off!! also the whole chair got airborne and flew into the side of my house.. I'm going to buy another one and anchor it down to the ground bc i love it that much
customer_reviews.author: Britni reed

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Style, and Great Pricing!
customer_reviews.text: This hammack lounger as i call it is very easy to put together! It is comfortable but adding a blanket or towel will really make it a place you can pass out! Best investment you can use anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Rabitsch

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated. Put it together and LOVED IT. It was outside from 4th if July to Labor Day and has already rusted and broken off at the shade on top. Now it’s just an expensive eyesore
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Buy one with an umbrella instead
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this is getting two stars is because it is comfortable to lay on and I could actually get it put together to lay on it, otherwise it would be getting one star. Man, where do I begin. The instructions have no words, none. The hardware isn't labeled, the hardware is labeled incorrectly on instructions, the parts are labeled wrong and some not labeled at all, some of the bars came rusted straight out of the package, oh, and the bottom support beams aren't long enough to fit. All around this was an absolute nightmare and I cannot believe I got this put together.
customer_reviews.author: lauren hambrick

customer_reviews.title: Super fast
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was super fade, I received in two days! Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: n.wydra

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it even at the risk of losing a finger or my sanity 😂
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a challenge putting together but once it's done it's well worth the price Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lana Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult last step experience!
customer_reviews.text: Look, this thing is a nightmare for some of us. The last step of putting the hammock bottom piece in the elbow pieces was impossible. I literally had to take a saw and cut the end of the piece to shorten in, needed 2 people to put weight on it while I pulled it into place. I’m sure this thing is going to be awesome but be aware if you are by yourself this would have been a wash.
customer_reviews.author: Britt M

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was sold as a great unit. However receive the gray lounge and a tan canopy. We attempted to have the issue resolved but the manufacturer Refuse to correct the problem. We would never buy anything from this company again
customer_reviews.author: Rick Raynsford

customer_reviews.title: Consider something with less possible assembly
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the most difficult things for my husband to assemble. There were no real specific instructions to speak of, basically just pictures of the parts and how they were supposed to fit together. When we got to the canopy the bars were rusty inside the plastic bag. If it was going to be easier to disassemble then we would have returned it!!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We love this lounger and enjoy it almost every day. The only down side, is that it was a little of a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Camere

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition but damaged poles
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, comfy addition to our backyard but I was very dissatisfied that every metal pole had these dings and dents. For the money you pay I’d expect better quality. Couldn’t find a way to message the seller directly and would truly expect this to have come in better condition. So far it’s very comfy and starting to stretch a bit so hopefully it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice lounger
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, looks very well made for the price. Great addition to our relaxing summer season.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing addition to our backyard. We have fallen asleep on this hammock many times.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Marks

customer_reviews.title: Nice lounger
customer_reviews.text: Nearly impossible to assemble, took HOURS! It was what we were looking for, although I wouldn’t have purchased if we’d known how tough it would be to put together. Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hicks

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely enjoy this chaise
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely enjoy this chaise. My husband, dog and me love it! We on it everyday. The only thing I think would improve it an adjustable back to sit up. Other than that great!
customer_reviews.author: Ojo

customer_reviews.title: Nice, big comfy lounger
customer_reviews.text: Good lounger for the money. Love the size of it, definitely plenty of room for 2 people with room to spare. It was pretty easy to assemble, but would be easier with some help. I would suggest taking the canopy off I or somehow securing the lounger on a windy day (learned that the hard way lol)
customer_reviews.author: SRin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece but...
customer_reviews.text: The piece is beautiful but it’s about the same size as a king sized mattress as opposed to “double”. No way was it easy to assemble. The hammock part was very hard to put together, you really need two strong men because the fabric part has zero give. Once together it’s pretty darn cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy canopy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to contact someone about replacing the canopy, but I’ve been unable to. We’ve had this for about a week. If someone could message me, I would appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Loving it I get compliments on this every time I have guests over. Not to mention my dogs love it to
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect additional to pool deck. Does sag a little in the middle after only a few uses but expected for an item like this but still comfortable with 2 people laying on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: This requires a major amount of assembly. The first bolts I put in would not tighten properly. Thankfully Amazon offered free return so back it went. Shame because I so wanted it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Loyo

customer_reviews.title: I do enjoy thus hammock
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy thus hammock, it us a great addition to the patio. Very comfortable,my kids have been known to sleep on it overnight. My only complaint us the browning of the fabric. I am in Las Vegas and it is in direct sunlight throughout mist if the day and has immediately starting browning with spots. Unfortunately that is the only reason for 2 star rating. I would like to know how to ckean or prevent this. Then I would absolutely give a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly simple to assemble, last pole not so easy with the fabric. Had to let it sit in the sun for a while to loosen up a little to secure the last pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor piece very comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Armentrout

customer_reviews.title: Great Hammock Bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and comfortable...need lots of muscles to assemble. But overall looks good 💖
customer_reviews.author: Lolita08

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Could not put together pieces did not fit each other. Multiple attempts with help. Had to return as the pieces never would work
customer_reviews.author: Mweirich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I paid someone to put this together for me and it probably took an hour and a half. He said it was difficult. This bed is perfect for my deck. It’s very sturdy and very heavy. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Shelton

customer_reviews.title: The best piece of outdoor furniture!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor bed, while a bit complicated to put together, was a great investment. We lay on it for outdoor naps, to read books, have drinks, anything! It is really comfortable and durable. The canopy is removable, but we have left it on in unexpected storms and it stays in place securely. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing things
customer_reviews.text: Besides being late delivery by several day. We are missing a strap and also a set of screws. And there was nothing on the instructions we actually found about the base support bars. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Blair

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth it! Instructions are pictures with letter labeling so it's not the worst to assemble, my partner put it together and she only asked for help a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Kittrell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE MOST RIDICULOUS THING IVE EVER TRIED TO OUT TOGETHER!! I GET IT CONNECTED IN THREE CORNERS AND CAN NOT GET IT TO CONNECT ON THE FOURTH CORNER BECAUSE THE HAMMOCK IS TOO TAUGHT. IM SO IRRITATED BY THE FACT THAT I WASTED MONEY ON SOMETHING I CANT EVEN GET PUT TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn W

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. The instructions need improvement. I should send pics to help.
customer_reviews.author: 4fun

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy!! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Okay this thing is awesome. I have it under my Gazebo and directly under and outdoor fan. Pure bliss. Awful to put together, that last pipe has to be forced in to fit. Other than that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Needed some extra-strength to put it together but looks awesome and it is super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Needed some extra-strength to put it together but looks awesome and it is super comfortable... several naps have taken place there already.
customer_reviews.author: jannet dannon-mairena

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looking forward to reading on it and taking nice long naps outside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is great by our pool and it is great to lay out and relax. My only disappointment is it doesn't have the gentle swing of the hammock feeling I wished for. I just didn't consider it when I bought
customer_reviews.author: picture goat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nightmare to put together. The directions suck. The holes didn’t like to line up easily at all. Had to beat the hell out of it with a hammer. Horrible design. Assembly alone is reason enough not to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Applegate

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is holding up to the elements
customer_reviews.text: This was not too bad to assemble. It did take me and my daughter to get it together but it didnt take long
customer_reviews.author: Julia F

customer_reviews.title: Disassembly is not easy
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for relaxing in the evening heat. Assembly took a bit of muscle in the last piece. The only downfall to it was the disassembly for transport it is impossible to disassemble alone. It is the best for its price sturdiness and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love this hammock!
customer_reviews.text: After we realized that some parts were labeled incorrectly and we got it all set up, we really enjoy this hammock. The little pillows that come with it aren’t the greatest or most comfortable but otherwise the hammock itself is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor sleeping
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect - it’s great for outdoor napping
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Frith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: It is almost impossible to assemble. But totally worth it. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Its very light to move,solid, and comfortable. the hardest part to assemble is to slide the woven mesh and slide the last piece together since you have to really pull on the woven mesh straight
customer_reviews.author: cesar alcala

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome!!!!! Anyone that sees it in my yard wants one. Very comfortable. If something happened to mine today, I would have another one ordered tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort of building
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this instead of getting a hammock. Turned out to be the perfect substitution. While it is a bit of a pain to put together, definitely a two person job, it was worth the time. Comfortable. Large enough for 2 tall adults. Great adjustable shade coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Yurko

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this hammock. It was easy to put together and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the time or money
customer_reviews.text: The box was mangled when it arrived, and there were holes And tears in the fabric, poles were all scratched up. Just put it back in the box and decided to not even attempt another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Nice Canana ----- but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. To hang out on and enjoy relaxing.But a big hassle to assemble. You will need at least two smart people to assemble. Use your own tools to assemble and don't over tighten the bolts. They are super cheap and strip easily. I really should a gave 3 stars but I'm feeling generous today. Also it come in an enormous box....so be prepared to have a helper ready
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but concern with awning frame
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product except the awning is very flimsy. I didn't assemble until 4th of July and by early August, the frame that supports the awning bent in half/broke due to a summer storm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Positives: Very durable (had 4 adults and a child laying on it), weather resistant, modern. Price ($150-$200) compared to other outdoor furniture is really good. Negatives: A little tough to put together (I did it by myself in under 2 hours), no wheel locks.
customer_reviews.author: Etai Avitan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We love laying out on it with a comforter at night. Super cozy and very comfortable. The husband, dog, and I fit great on it with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Super comfy. It's exactly where you wanna be when outside
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Miniet

customer_reviews.title: frustrated!!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this furniture to anyone!! It is nearly impossible to put together!!! Im on the the 2nd person I hired to put this thing together and we still cannot get it together!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy, exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, better than the more cotton-blend versions you find out there. I enjoy having this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Billig

customer_reviews.title: Sun bed
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT !!!!! This is the second one I’ve purchased... I bought a cover for it because I’m in South Florida with plenty of sun, and my first one lasted 3 years with no issues ...
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Very comfortable. I ended up buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Enjoli

product_meta.title: Abba Patio Outdoor Portable Double Chaise Lounge Hammock Bed with Sun Shade and Wheels
feature_bullets: Weather-resistant Quick-dry textilene fabric is perfect for outdoor use. Tubular steel stand is powder-coated for long lasting usage
6.56' Long, Sized for 2 person; 500 lb. weight capacity
The Polyester canopy blocks UV rays and give you enough shade while you read or snooze
Hammock-like chaise lounge for any outdoor climate
2 attached pillows for extra comfort; 2 wheels for easy portability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars368 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
